title: Dr Ly Natural Health
cleaned_text: ** Announcement from Dr. Ly Natural Health ** We follow the guidance of CDC and now masks are not required at our clinics but still encouraged to protect yourself and the others. If you feel sick, such as having a fever or having flu-like or COVID symptoms, please contact us and cancel your appointment in advance. We thank you for your understanding and entrusting us with your health. Sincerely, Dr. Ly Natural Health ACUPUNCTURE AND CHINESE MEDICINE Serving the mid-south for over 40 years Dr. Ly Natural Health has been caring for patients in the Southeast U.S. since its establishment in 1982. Our founder and senior acupuncturist, Alexander Ly has over fifty years of experience practicing Traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) and acupuncture. Alexander is highly regarded and respected by his peers and patients both on local and national levels. Over the past few decades, he has mentored and trained health care professionals including other acupuncturists and physicians. At our three thriving practices in Alabama and Tennessee, our team has been providing effective, holistic, personalized treatment with great results.
